sentences.en: an impressive building with a red brick facade
sentences.cn: 正面为红砖的雄伟建筑

sentences.en: Behind the facade they are just like the rest of us.
sentences.cn: 在那副外表背后，他们和我们大家是完全一样的。

sentences.en: But underneath its tranquil facade, it buzzes with biochemical chatter.
sentences.cn: 不过在平静的表面以下, 它的生化分子在吵吵哄哄.

sentences.en: Her honesty was all a facade.
sentences.cn: 她的诚实只是一种表面现象.

sentences.en: His fine clothes are a mere facade.
sentences.cn: 他漂亮的衣着只是虚有其表而已.

sentences.en: I tried to erect a facade of imperviousness and self - confidence .
sentences.cn: 我竭力装出一幅不受外界干扰,十分 自信 的样子.

sentences.en: If you look carefully, you can see through Bob's facade.
sentences.cn: 如果你仔细观察, 你就能看穿鲍勃的外表.

sentences.en: In the evening the facade is floodlit.
sentences.cn: 晚上，建筑正面被泛光灯照亮。

sentences.en: That is the facade of the Palace.
That is the ornate facade of the Palace.
sentences.cn: 那是宫殿装饰华丽的正面。

sentences.en: The cathedral was eventually completed in 1490, though the Gothic facade remains unfinished.
sentences.cn: 那座大教堂最终于1490年建成，但其哥特式风格的正面一直未能完工。

sentences.en: The entrance facade consists of a large full height glass door.
sentences.cn: 入口正面有一大型全高度玻璃门.

sentences.en: The facade of the building was a little weathered.
The holes in the facade form a huge reproduction of Mount Everest.
sentences.cn: 上面的孔像喜马拉雅山巨大的复制品.

sentences.en: The surface that encloses the columbarium is set back from its facade allowing a window box with enough space to place flowerplots, not only for small plants, but for all kind of flowers .
sentences.cn: 骨灰龛的表面从立面向后退缩了一些距离，让每个窗格都有足够的空间来种花，这里不仅能种小型植物，而是可以种多种花卉植物。

sentences.en: The volume and the facade are the only territories of design freedom, along with some decisions with respect to finishes in the lobbies and the parking areas.
sentences.cn: 建筑体量与立面是建筑师唯一可自由发挥的地方，以及关于大堂和停车场装饰装修方面的某些决策，也可以自行决定。

sentences.en: They hid the troubles plaguing their marriage behind a facade of family togetherness.
sentences.cn: 他们将困扰婚姻的问题掩藏在家庭和睦的外表之下。

sentences.en: Throughout her life she has hidden her insecurities behind a facade of , at times , overweening self - confidence.
sentences.cn: 在她一生中,她常常靠摆出泰然自若的样子, 来掩饰内心的犹豫不定.

sentences.en: While the project wants to open up the facade for a through ventilation, the different identities of various shops on the facade would have made the building appear to be fragmented.
sentences.cn: 虽然这个项目想要实现自然通风并设计一个开放的外观，但是各种各样不同类型的商店将会使整个建筑表面显得零碎。

words.tran_cn: 有某种面孔或表情的；有…表面的
面部的，表面的；脸的，面部用的

trans.tran_cn: 建筑物的正面，外表，虚伪，假象
trans.tran_en: the front of a building, especially a large and important one
